object.name: uploadStickerFile
object.description: Use this method to upload a .PNG file with a sticker for later use in createNewStickerSet and addStickerToSet methods (can be used multiple times). Returns the uploaded File on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to upload a .PNG file with a sticker for later use in createNewStickerSet and addStickerToSet methods (can be used multiple times). Returns the uploaded File on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to upload a .PNG file with a sticker for later use in *createNewStickerSet* and *addStickerToSet* methods (can be used multiple times). Returns the uploaded :class:`aiogram.types.file.File` on success.

annotations.description: User identifier of sticker file owner
annotations.rst_description: User identifier of sticker file owner
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: PNG image with the sticker, must be up to 512 kilobytes in size, dimensions must not exceed 512px, and either width or height must be exactly 512px. More information on Sending Files
annotations.html_description: PNG image with the sticker, must be up to 512 kilobytes in size, dimensions must not exceed 512px, and either width or height must be exactly 512px. More information on Sending Files »
annotations.rst_description: **PNG** image with the sticker, must be up to 512 kilobytes in size, dimensions must not exceed 512px, and either width or height must be exactly 512px. :ref:`More information on Sending Files » <sending-files>`
annotations.name: png_sticker

annotations.description: Format of the sticker, must be one of 'static', 'animated', 'video'
annotations.html_description: Format of the sticker, must be one of “static”, “animated”, “video”
annotations.rst_description: Format of the sticker, must be one of 'static', 'animated', 'video'
annotations.name: sticker_format

annotations.description: A file with the sticker in .WEBP, .PNG, .TGS, or .WEBM format. See https://core.telegram.org/stickers for technical requirements. More information on Sending Files
annotations.html_description: A file with the sticker in .WEBP, .PNG, .TGS, or .WEBM format. See https://core.telegram.org/stickers for technical requirements. More information on Sending Files »
annotations.rst_description: A file with the sticker in .WEBP, .PNG, .TGS, or .WEBM format. See `https://core.telegram.org/stickers <https://core.telegram.org/stickers>`_`https://core.telegram.org/stickers <https://core.telegram.org/stickers>`_ for technical requirements. :ref:`More information on Sending Files » <sending-files>`
annotations.name: sticker
